General.Name: Access Bio Inc
General.Description: Access Bio, Inc. engages in the research, development, and manufacture of in vitro rapid diagnostic tests, biosensors, and molecular diagnostic products worldwide. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Somerset, New Jersey.
General.Address: 65 Clyde Road, Somerset, NJ, United States, 08873
